entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 12 except minus 16 inland.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 12 except minus 16 inland. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17 except minus 22 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 17 except minus 22 inland. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
